Text.Page:
Your people take all the shards, wendigos die because of it.

Madyar say your people not want war with wendigos, but he not stop mining. What will you do? Will you help us find a solution?"I'm here to help."

Strength important to wendigos. Wendigo {@LinkCreature:34#510#frostweavers} and {@LinkCreature:34#500#frostmages} take energy from yellow stones on ground. Make them look strong.

If you take yellow stones, they will be weak. Other wendigos see mages not strong. They'll see Uchamba is strong. They'll see Uchamba is right.

Your deeds match words. Uchamba respect you and Madyar.

Now, we can build future.
Madyar call yellow stones "xanthic shards." Take away mages' power.
